bibl.title: Tracking Thomas: A Text-Critical Look at the Transmission of the Gospel of Thomas.
bibl.note: Compare les témoins grecs et coptes, en part. P. Oxy. I, 1 (= van Haelst 594; LDAB 4028); IV, 654 (= van Haelst 593; LDAB 4030); 655 (= van Haelst 595; LDAB 4029).

bibl.title: "Revisiting the Corruption of the New Testament. Manuscript, Patristic, and Apocryphal Evidence"

bibl.seg: Tim Ricchuiti, Tracking Thomas: A Text-Critical Look at the Transmission of the Gospel of Thomas.
Daniel B. Wallace (ed.), Revisiting the Corruption of the New Testament. Manuscript, Patristic, and Apocryphal Evidence = Text and Canon of the New Testament. 1 (Grand Rapids, MI, 2011) pp. 189-228.
Compare les témoins grecs et coptes, en part. P. Oxy. I, 1 (= van Haelst 594; LDAB 4028); IV, 654 (= van Haelst 593; LDAB 4030); 655 (= van Haelst 595; LDAB 4029).
